product_name: Garmin Montana Automotive Suction Cup Mount with Speaker
long_description: The Garmin Montana Automotive Suction Cup mount with speaker let's you take full advantage of the Montana's versatility, letting you place it on your dashboard or windshield and take it on the road. Integrated speaker makes it easy to hear spoken turn-by-turn driving directions (when your Montana GPS is used with City Navigator NT mapping, sold separately). The Garmin Montana Automotive Suction Cup mount with speaker comes with a vehicle power cable.
short_description: The Garmin Montana Automotive Suction Cup mount with speaker let's you take full advantage of the Montana's versatility, letting you place it on your dashboard or windshield and take it on the road.
